name: dishevelled-bio
schema:releaseNotes:
## Compatibility notes
* Deprecated code has been removed in version 3.0, introducing binary incompatibilities compared to version 2.4
* BED format support was improved in version 3.0, introducing binary incompatibilities compared to version 2.4
* Multiple implementations of `FastaToParquet` and other Parquet-writing tools are annotated as **Beta** in this release; after further performance benchmarking the multiple implementations will be merged into one or two e.g. `FastaToParquet` tool implementation(s)

## What's Changed
* Added UniProt XML format support and tools
* Added PanSN-spec: Pangenome Sequence Naming support and tools
* improve BED support per hts-specs version 1.0 specification by @heuermh in https://github.com/heuermh/dishevelled-bio/pull/60


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/heuermh/dishevelled-bio/compare/dsh-bio-2.4...dsh-bio-3.0
